participant_abstract.sent: The meeting discussed how to market a new remote control when there are already a significant number of remote controls on the market.
The group discussed what was needed in a remote control, such as function and design, to make it user friendly, trendy, cost effective, and original.
The price was discussed, as well as ideas about how to make it original.
All group members contributed ideas about what they look for in a remote control, and what could be done to make this one original and different.
The group discussed different marketing strategies, and what needed to be done to the product to make consumers say "I want it!"

participant_actions.sent: Project manager- direct meeting, follow schedule.
Market researcher-discuss any holes in the market, how to best market the product internationally.
UI Designer- discuss design for product, how to make it unusual.
Ind Designer- discuss what materials to use on the product, how to make it cost effective and functional.

participant_decisions.sent: make product different from other remote controls on the market (different appearance).
Make it obvious how product works (user friendly).
make product easy to use, such as using lighted buttons.
new ideas for remote controls such as inter-changeable face plates.

participant_problems.sent: how to make product different than those already on the market.
